home.subtitle: Achieve your business goals
home.text: Build a brand that stands out, engage new customers and grow your business with marketing solutions tailored to your needs.

about.subtitle: Who We Are?
about.text: Universe Force is a team of problem solvers, strategists and technology enthusiasts who believe every business deserves the tools and expertise to thrive. We work with you to solve challenges, simplify your business and open up new opportunities for growth. With years of experience in business development, marketing and IT services, we understand the real challenges businesses face. Whether it's refining your strategy, improving efficiency or upgrading your technology, we're here to make things simpler and better.

reasons.title: Simplicity
reasons.text: We keep things simple: no jargon, no overcomplications — just clear, effective solutions.

reasons.title: Uniqueness
reasons.text: We tailor everything to your needs, so you get exactly what works for your business.

reasons.title: Support
reasons.text: We're with you every step of the way, offering guidance and support whenever you need it.

services.title: usluge
services.subtitle: Digital solutions we offer
services.description: True success occurs where vision meets opportunity and strategy meets boldness. We believe that every challenge carries within it the potential for growth, if viewed from the right angle. Our approach is not just to solve problems, but to redefine the boundaries of what is possible. We build solutions that not only respond to today's requirements, but shape tomorrow's standards - because the future belongs to those who don't look for opportunities, but create them.

cardList.title: Brand Development
cardList.text: From creating a logo, coming up with striking messages that you want to convey to your customers and refreshing outdated branding to creating a precise marketing plan.

cardList.title: Market Research
cardList.text: We provide insight into consumer behavior, competition and market trends, in order to create the most effective marketing campaigns.

cardList.title: Digital Marketing
cardList.text: We create a positive digital presence and greater visibility on all platforms. By running social networks, creating and promoting quality content, organically and through PPC ads, we connect you with new clients and open new markets.

cardList.title: Offline Marketing
cardList.text: We increase the visibility of your brand through event marketing, print campaigns and direct contact with clients.

cardList.title: Performance Analytics
cardList.text: We monitor and improve campaigns; with the help of the obtained data, we perform A/B testing and create detailed reports.

workflow.title: Free Consultation
workflow.text: Let’s start with a conversation! We’ll learn about your challenges, explore solutions, and share how we can help—all at no cost. It’s all about understanding your goals and laying the groundwork for success.

workflow.title: Contract
workflow.text: Once we’re on the same page, we’ll outline the plan in a simple, clear contract. This includes everything you need to know—deliverables, timelines, and costs—so we can get started with confidence.

workflow.title: Prototype
workflow.text: See your ideas take shape! We’ll create a first version for you to review, refine, and perfect together. Your feedback ensures the final result matches your vision.

workflow.title: Launch
workflow.text: It’s go time! We’ll bring your project to life and make sure everything runs smoothly. After launch, we’ll stick around to support you and explore new ways to help you grow.

contact.title: Contact
contact.description: Discover how we can transform your brand and help you achieve your business goals. Our first consultation is completely free!

privacyPolicy.title: Privacy Policy
privacyPolicy.intro: Universe Force Group DOO Beograd ("Company," "we," "our," or "us") is committed to protecting your privacy in compliance with Serbian data protection laws and the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR). This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, and safeguard your information when you visit our website (https://universeforcemarketing.com/) or use our services.

list.title: Personal Data
list.text: Name, email address, phone number, and any other information you provide when contacting us or using our services.

list.title: Non-Personal Data
list.text: Browser type, operating system, IP address, and other technical details collected automatically when you access our website.

list.title: Cookies and Tracking Technologies
list.text: Cookies and similar technologies to enhance your user experience and gather analytics.

sections.title: Legal Basis for Processing
sections.text: We process your personal data in accordance with Serbian law and GDPR based on the following legal grounds:
list: Consent: Where you have given clear consent for specific purposes.
Contractual Necessity: Where processing is necessary to fulfill a contract.
Legal Obligation: Where processing is required to comply with legal obligations.
Legitimate Interests: Where processing is necessary for our legitimate interests, provided it does not override your rights.

sections.title: How We Use Your Information
sections.text: We may use the information collected for the following purposes:
list: To provide and manage our services.
To respond to inquiries and communicate with you.
To improve and optimize our website and services.
To comply with legal obligations and enforce our terms.

sections.title: Sharing Your Information
sections.text: We do not sell or share your personal information except as necessary to:
list: Provide services through trusted partners or service providers.
Comply with legal obligations or respond to lawful requests from authorities.
Protect the rights and safety of our Company, users, or others.

sections.title: Data Retention
sections.text: We retain your personal data for as long as necessary to fulfill the purposes outlined in this Privacy Policy or as required by law.

sections.title: Your Rights
sections.text: Under GDPR and Serbian law, you have the following rights:
list: Access: Request access to the personal data we hold about you.
Correction: Request correction of inaccurate or incomplete personal data.
Deletion: Request deletion of your personal data.
Restriction: Request that we limit processing your personal data.
Data Portability: Request a copy of your personal data in a structured format.
Objection: Object to the processing of your personal data based on legitimate interests.
Withdraw Consent: Withdraw your consent at any time for processing based on consent.

sections.title: Cookies and Tracking Technologies
sections.text: We use cookies to understand your preferences, save them for future visits, and compile aggregate data to improve our services.

sections.title: Data Security
sections.text: We implement technical and organizational measures to safeguard your personal data. However, no system can guarantee 100% security.

sections.title: Cross-Border Data Transfers
sections.text: If we transfer your data outside Serbia or the EEA, we ensure it is protected through mechanisms compliant with GDPR.

sections.title: Third-Party Links
sections.text: Our website may contain links to external websites. We are not responsible for their privacy practices or content. Review their privacy policies before providing personal data.

sections.title: Changes to This Privacy Policy
sections.text: We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. Changes will be posted on this page with an updated 'Effective Date.'

sections.title: Contact Information
sections.text: For questions or concerns about this Privacy Policy, contact us at:
list: Universe Force Group DOO Beograd®
Email: office@universeforcegroup.com
